game.name: Big Beautiful Women: Giantess Dating Action
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: If you like big girls, this is the game for you. Play as a college student trying to find love in a city full of giant ladies. 5 lovely ladies to woo, 5 stats to manage, and 10 endings to reach. Can you fall in love before you graduate?
game.shortDescriptionEn: If you like big girls, this is the game for you. Play as a college student trying to find love in a city full of giant ladies. 5 lovely ladies to woo, 5 stats to manage, and 10 endings to reach. Can you fall in love before you graduate?
